Key Match Events: The Dallas Mavericks won the game by a score of 119-99 against the Chicago Bulls
Post-Match Reflections: Luka Doncic spoke about Klay Thompson after the game, stating that it takes time to develop chemistry with a new player like Thompson.
Doncic feels confident that the connection with Klay Thompson will improve with time
Miscellaneous Highlights: Klay Thompson has been able to fit in well through their first eight games.
Thompson has made 1,175 catch-and-shoot threes since the 2016-17 season, the most among active players
Others: The Dallas Mavericks improved to 5-3 in their first eight games of the new season.
The Chicago Bulls dropped to 3-5 in their first eight games
